title: Over 19s LGBT Focus Group
description:
Details

• What do you like about your local area, including services or groups that work well?
• What services do you currently access and how could they be improved?
• Have you had difficulty accessing any services in South Cambridgeshire that you believe is a result of your sexuality, age, gender, and lifestyle?
• If you have experienced crime or anti-social behaviour in your local area

South Cambridgeshire Crime and Disorder Reduction Partnership (CDRP) in partnership with Dhiverse want to hear from LGBT+ people at our focus group about their experiences of living in South Cambridgeshire (you must be a resident of South Cambridgeshire).

For your valued time you will receive a £10 voucher of your choice (Amazon, Tesco’s, Cinema, Nando’s etc) and there will be Coffee and Cake provided!

Please RSVP to Jack.Ossel@cambridgeshire.gov.uk if you are interested in attending.

If you require transport we can make arrangements:
